description: I. Maurice Smith Review: a review of the measures to prevent the promotion of racism by teachers and the wider workforce in schools. Jan 2010. 31 p. II. Letter dated 11/03/2010 from Ed Balls MP to Barry Sheerman MP regarding the Maurice Smith review and the idea of banning teachers if they are members of organisations that promote racism and intolerance. 1 p. III. Letter dated 11/03/2010 from Ed Balls MP to Maurice Smith CB thanking him and commenting upon his review of racism and the teachoing profession. 4 p.
department: Department for Children, Schools and Families
